Text: Blue Dolpin August and September Cc Darren I received another invoice for September production for Blue Dolphin Are we responsible for transportation fees for September and future production months Also do the dehydration fees MEI apply to AEP as well Currently the August invoices have not been paid If ENA Upstream is not responsible let me know whowhere I should forward the invoices Original Message From Olsen Michael Sent Friday October PM To Beale Antoinette Subject RE Blue Dolpin August We have no activity with Blue Dolphin This has got to be AEP old HPL business Original Message From Beale Antoinette Sent Friday October AM To Olsen Michael Cc Chance Lee Ann Subject Blue Dolpin August Mike I have received an invoice from Blue Dolphin for August Nothing is scheduled in ENA or Upstream for August production Let me know your thoughts on the matter Thanks

RE LoneStar for Cc Darren The deals were actualized to zero because the TXU pipeline statement shows no activity at the point the deals are scheduled Mike and I have spoken about the discrepancies From my understanding Mike is in contact with TXU about these deals and others in question Currently I am in a holding status awaiting the outcome If you would like a copy of the statement I would be glad to bring it to you Let me know if I can do anything more to alleviate the issues at hand Antoinette ext Original Message From Spears Christopher Sent Friday September PM To Beale Antoinette Cc Chance Lee Ann Subject FW LoneStar for Antoinette Please get with Daren regarding the deal mentioned below Thanks Chris Original Message From Baxter Bryce Sent Friday September PM To Anastas Sherry Spears Christopher Cc Farmer Daren J Subject FW LoneStar for SherryChris can one of you get back with Daren on this Daren FYI my group doesnt actualize volumes That is done in Rita WynneMark McClures Volume Management group Let me know if you need anything else from me Thanks Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Friday September PM To Baxter Bryce Subject FW LoneStar for Bryce Please forward this to the appropriate person in your group I need someone to look into deal Sitara referenced below Why were these deals actualized to zero D Original Message From Willis Annette Sent Thursday September AM To Farmer Daren J Cc Shepherd Marsha Subject LoneStar for To recap what we talked about this morning The following deals were done for June ENA is not showing these deals in you system so therefore they wont pay sold to ENA between Roger Daren sold to ENA between Roger Daren sold to ENA between Roger Daren sold to EOL between Roger EOL sold d to EOL between Roger EOL Thank you in advance for your help with this

Blue Dolpin August and September Cc Darren I received another invoice for September production for Blue Dolphin Are we responsible for transportation fees for September and future production months Also do the dehydration fees MEI apply to AEP as well Currently the August invoices have not been paid If ENA Upstream is not responsible let me know whowhere I should forward the invoices Original Message From Olsen Michael Sent Friday October PM To Beale Antoinette Subject RE Blue Dolpin August We have no activity with Blue Dolphin This has got to be AEP old HPL business Original Message From Beale Antoinette Sent Friday October AM To Olsen Michael Cc Chance Lee Ann Subject Blue Dolpin August Mike I have received an invoice from Blue Dolphin for August Nothing is scheduled in ENA or Upstream for August production Let me know your thoughts on the matter Thanks
TXU May Cc Mike I have the following outstanding issue with TXU May Contract A path is needed on Delivery for mmbtus with the Receipt point Thanks

RE June Blue Dolphin Cc Darren Thank you for such a prompt response When looking in the Volume Management I saw volume scheduled in ENA and ENA Upstream I actualized in ENA and I heard that Blue Dolphin will go to upstream starting July production month Could you confirm which entity for the month of June Thanks Antoinette Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Monday July PM To Beale Antoinette Subject FW June Blue Dolphin Antoinette I spoke with Nelson Ferries today We are responsible for the transport fees on Blue Dolphin for June I have pathed the volumes in Unify Please look into this and let me know if you have any questions Additionally I input the purchase and sale deals that were not in the system Can you please inform the appropriate person in settlements to handle those deals Thanks D Original Message From Smith George F Sent Friday July PM To Farmer Daren J Subject FW June Blue Dolphin Darren You may want to give Antoinette a call Original Message From Beale Antoinette Sent Friday July PM To Smith George F Cc Beale Antoinette Subject June Blue Dolphin George I just wanted to touch base with you on the status of June Blue Dolphin You stated on Tuesday that Enron was not responsible for June Could you update me on any information you have acquired Thanks Antoinette

REThank you for your response When all else fails stand strong and press on Many Blessings to You Original Message From Wells Tori L On Behalf Of Lay Kenneth Sent Monday November AM To Beale Antoinette Subject Antoinette I very much appreciate your email and agree with most of what you said But for very practical reasons the management and the Board decided a merger with Dynegy was the best alternative for Enron Thank you Ken
